thread.title: Roxie
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Roxie

author: Roxie
title: Roxie
text: Ashley C reviewed my options, and clearly explained my options and choices to me. She made sure I understood exactly what each option entailed and what consequences were to be expected. I had no surprises and whenever I had a question or concern, she would reply in a efficient and timely manner. I could not be more satisfied with my decision and am very thankful to have had Ashley work with me to rise from a very difficult situation.
